description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5i6aa","text":"This protocol details symbiotic dose-50 (SD50) for Vibrio fischeri strain to colonize Euprymna scolopes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":43,"length":2},{"style":"italic","offset":51,"length":15},{"style":"italic","offset":86,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

keywords: Preparation of V. fischeri Cultures, Preparation of Juvenile E. scolopes, Inoculation Phase,Measurement of Bioluminescence,Euthanasia and Storage of Animals,Scoring of Bioluminescence

Filter through 0.22 surfactant-free filter.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14acm","text":"Microfuge tubes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aklpu","text":"50-mL conical tubes","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6eqc9","text":"LBS plates","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dje6b","text":"Vials","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qebp","text":"Luminometer","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"favln","text":"For each strain of interest, initiate a starter culture by inoculating   LBS with an isolated colony. Incubate starter cultures   (~16 h) at   shaking at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":128,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":141,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":154,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"iu5m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"3F75AB20C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"435E5700C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A538B1A0C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"28","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"55184DC0C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"200","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aom2j","text":"Measure the OD600 of each starter culture.  In a microfuge tube, normalize each starter culture by diluting it to an OD600 of 1.0 in fresh LBS to a final volume of  .  Vortex briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":14,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":119,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":164,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.0","error":false,"guid":"7121BBA0C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3p1i","text":"Initiate an intermediate culture by inoculating   LBS in a fresh culture tube with   of the normalized cell suspension.  Incubate at   shaking at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":133,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":146,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fscqc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"7B685920C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"80AEE750C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"91F18B30C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"28","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8BEBF2C0C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"200","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6v8lh","text":"Collect freshly hatched juvenile squid into tumblers containing   FSSW, with no more than 50 squid/tumbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eno5r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"BE145F30C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c66o7","text":"For each group, add   FSSW to a tumbler.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"C62976B0C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4esf8","text":"Transfer animals individually to each tumbler.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crht3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b13v2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9qih","text":"To minimize bias, add an animal to the tumbler of a different group with each transfer.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ah7v4","text":"For each strain, when the turbidity of culture is OD600 = 0.8-1.0, transfer culture volume equivalent to   of OD600 = 1.0 to a microfuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":52,"length":3},{"style":"sub","offset":112,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"D6D272A0C86D11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fh8vc","text":"Concentrate cells by centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9sl02","text":"Prepare a serial dilution by transferring   of the cell suspension described in Step 8 into   FSSW in a microfuge tube (10-1 dilution).  Then, continue ten-fold dilutions until the desired dilution range has been achieved.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9u1qn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b89g0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"347E17B0C86E11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.9","error":false,"guid":"564DF220C86E11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b1if7","text":"Note that three-fold dilutions can be used instead for greater resolution.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"k381","text":"Prepare a control for an apo-symbiotic group by transferring   FSSW to a microfuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1fa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"60037330C86E11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ouhr","text":"For each group, transfer   from the corresponding microfuge tube into a 50-mL conical tube containing   FSSW and invert several times to mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"62EE5E20C86E11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"65B8A1B0C86E11ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9otph","text":"To initiate the inoculation phase, pour the cell suspension into the corresponding tumbler to bring the total volume to  .  Repeat for the control described in Step 10.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"73p1p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"20A54DB0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2i6c7","text":"Sample tumblers by plating   onto solid LBS medium in triplicate and incubate the plates at    .  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"76qc0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"22ine","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"348B2520C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"446649C0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"28","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"4743EE40C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":11,"offset":246,"style":"italic"}],"key":"di1rk","text":"Note that for high inoculum levels, a dilution may be necessary to obtain countable CFUs.  For low inoculum levels, it may be preferable to use the known dilution factor from more concentrated inoculums to estimate the corresponding abundance of V. fischeri.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d597a","text":"After 3.5 hours, wash the animals by serially transferring them as a group into a tumbler containing   FSSW twice, with   between transfers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":101,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"865ABFA0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"8CDDC570C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bj2ce","text":"Transfer animals into vials containing   FSSW, with one animal per vial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2squ","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"93FF5530C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"37k13","text":"Store animals in a room that has a 12-h day/12-h night light cycle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejp72","text":"After 16-18 h, transfer animals to clean vials containing   FSSW.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"A16E0DB0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drfkl","text":"Using a luminometer, measure the luminescence emitted by each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1jb4j","text":"To initiate the anesthesia step, transfer each animal with seawater (total volume of  ) to a microfuge tube and place  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":118,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"A8E33BB0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AB7CAB40C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12nli","text":"After  , add   cold 6% ethanol/FSSW to each microfuge tube and keep  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1febk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"CA913640C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"B2E444B0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B5ECC9C0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"191b9","text":"After  , remove the liquid volume from the tube and store the anesthetized animal at  , thereby completing euthanasia.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"D5DA9DC0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BE561BC0C87011ED9A8B03D31606EA07","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fsc4e","text":"Use the luminescence measurements of the apo-symbiotic group to determine the 99.9th percentile, above which animals are considered to be bioluminescent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6c2c7","text":"Score each animal as symbiotic or non-symbiotic by comparing the corresponding luminescence measurement with the bioluminescence cutoff defined in Step 22.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32s3v","text":"Count CFU on the inoculum plates generated in Step 13.  Also verify that no CFU are present on the apo-symbiotic control plates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a3i5s","text":"Calculate the concentration of CFUs in each inoculum cell suspension described in Step 9 by dividing the CFU counts by the volume plated (in mL) and multiplying by the dilution factor, if any.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fjams","text":"For each strain, generate a table with the number of symbiotic and non-symbiotic animals at each inoculum concentration, with rows arranged in order of highest to lowest concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d2cl","text":"Prepare two additional columns containing adjusted counts for ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gm61","text":"animals that could be assumed to be symbiotic at higher inoculums and","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ake9j","text":"animals that could be assumed to be non-symbiotic at lower inoculums.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p888","text":"Calculate the adjusted percent of symbiotic animals at each inoculum by dividing the adjusted counts of symbiotic animals by the total adjusted animal counts in the corresponding row.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bjgu","text":"Calculate the SD50 using the equation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":16,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euc0c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfgio","text":"SD50 = 10^[log(DF^X) + log(c)], where","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":2,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee6q1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kvvn","text":"X = [(50%-a)/(b-a)] and","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh4rl","text":"a = the adjusted percent symbiotic below 50% closest to 50%.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eo1h8","text":"b = the adjusted percent symbiotic above 50% closest to 50%.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84aki","text":"c = the inoculum concentration of the adjusted percent colonized below 50% closest to 50%.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7523c","text":"DF = the dilution factor or fold-change difference between groups in the experiment.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5r9el","text":"Concentrate cells by centrifugation at  .  Then, remove   supernatant, add   FSSW, and resuspend the pellet.  (1/2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":150,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0D6510FDC86E11ED9BBD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.9","centrifuge":"5000","duration":150,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0D6511ADC86E11ED9BBD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.9","centrifuge":"5000","duration":150,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0D651223C86E11ED9BBD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"23mts","text":"Concentrate cells by centrifugation at  .  Then, remove   supernatant, add   FSSW, and resuspend the pellet.  (1/2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"5000","duration":150,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1E104C83C86E11ED9BBD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.9","centrifuge":"5000","duration":150,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1E104DD1C86E11ED9BBD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.9","centrifuge":"5000","duration":150,"error":false,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1E104E6AC86E11ED9BBD0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":2}}}}

title: Symbiotic Dose-50 (SD50) for Vibrio fischeri strain to colonize Euprymna scolopes
